title: Calories in Eggo Waffles
meta_description: Discover calories in Eggo waffles, including macros like carbs, protein, and fat for a standard serving of two, plus tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Standard Eggo Homestyle waffles, toasted from frozen, no toppings or syrup added; approx. 35 g per waffle.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by Eggo flavor (e.g., buttermilk, blueberry), preparation, and brand updates. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: Two Eggo waffles provide about 180 calories, 4 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp maple syrup per waffle

faqs.q: How many calories in one Eggo waffle?
faqs.a: About 90 calories per standard homestyle Eggo waffle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Eggo waffles?
faqs.a: Two waffles have 30 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 4 g sugars.

faqs.q: Do Eggo waffles have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, two waffles contain 310 mg sodium; opt for low-sodium varieties if needed.

faqs.q: How much protein in Eggo waffles?
faqs.a: Two waffles provide 4 g protein; consider toppings like peanut butter for more.

faqs.q: Calories in Eggo waffles with toppings?
faqs.a: Base is 180 kcal for two; adding syrup or butter can add 50â€“100 kcal easily.
